name: Deafening Roar
description: Roar with bloodlust to terrify up to 6 nearby enemies, fearing them for 4 seconds and setting them Off Balance for 7 seconds.  Your roar also leaves enemies dazed, applying Major Breach and Minor Maim, reducing their Physical and Spell Resistance by 5948 and damage done by 5% for 10 seconds.  While slotted you gain Major Savagery and Prophecy, increasing your Weapon and Spell Critical rating by 2629.
effectLines: Applies Major Breach and Minor Maim to enemies, reducing their Resistances and damage done.
rawDescription:
